attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This is a petition that involves the recognition of the British Service Men buried on Crab Island, Lake Champlain.
 For a monument to be erected on behalf of the British people for the men who lost their lives during the second war with America 1812-1814 in particular the Battle of Plattsburgh.

rejection.details: Your title should be a call for action not a name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
